title: Archie & Sabrina's Halloween Coloring Book
description: Archie and Sabrina team-up for a spook-tacularly fun coloring book!It's the ultimate treat for those looking to get colorful! Everyone's favorite teenage witch joins the fun as the whole Riverdale gang is back for a Halloween-themed coloring book. There are plenty of costumes, candies and creatures to customize in this latest entry! Plus, each image has an intricate background pattern to add to your color experience. The possibilities are endless and the fun never stops!
author: Archie Superstars
